// Exile's Curse (Adept) (god-pve,god-pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coil + Field Prep/Grave Robber + MKC/Disruption Break
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap
Chosen Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coils + Slideshot + Vorpal/HIR
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart
Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:god-pve,god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=276080079&perks=1840239774,1687452232,3161816588,2213355989
dimwishlist:item=276080079&perks=1392496348,1687452232,3161816588,2213355989
dimwishlist:item=276080079&perks=1482024992,1687452232,3161816588,2213355989

Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:god-pvp

// Exile's Curse (Adept) (pve,pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coil + Field Prep/Grave Robber + MKC/Disruption Break
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap
Chosen Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coils + Slideshot + Vorpal/HIR
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart
Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=276080079&perks=1687452232,3161816588,2213355989

// Exile's Curse (Adept) (pve,pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coil + Field Prep/Grave Robber + MKC/Disruption Break
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap
Chosen Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coils + Slideshot + Vorpal/HIR
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart
Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:pve,pvp

// Waking Vigil (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh tags:god-pvp

// Waking Vigil (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit + Dfly/Dbreak/Vorpal/Kill Clip
60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently procd in higher level content.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh.
Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies.
 tags:god-pve

// Waking Vigil (pvp)
//notes: PvP: X + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC
Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible.
Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh tags:pvp

// Exile's Curse (god-pve,god-pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coil + Field Prep/Grave Robber + MKC/Disruption Break
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap
Chosen Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coils + Slideshot + Vorpal/HIR
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart
Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:god-pve,god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=1840239774,1687452232,3161816588,2213355989
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=1392496348,1687452232,3161816588,2213355989
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=1482024992,1687452232,3161816588,2213355989

Chosen Variant
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart
Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:god-pvp

// Exile's Curse (pve,pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coil + Field Prep/Grave Robber + MKC/Disruption Break
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap
Chosen Variant
PvE: Any + Liquid Coils + Slideshot + Vorpal/HIR
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Liquid Coils + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart
Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you dont lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=1687452232,3161816588,2213355989

//notes: PvE: Any + Tac/Appended Mag + Surplus/Rapid Hit/Outlaw + Wellspring/MKC/Dbreak/Rampage/Demo/Dfly/Explosive Payload
PvP: Hammer/Fluted/Polygonal/Arrowhead/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Rapid Hit/Quickdraw/Slideshot/Rangefinder/Outlaw + MKC/Rampage/EP/Opening Shot (EotS and HIR are possible choices, which have less usage than the other final column perks listed here, but are still something)

// Extraordinary Rendition (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any + Tac/Appended + Overflow/Outlaw/Surplus + OfA/MKC/Rampage/(Frenzy?)/Thresh
Surplus + Frenzy combo buff handling, reload, stability (10/20/50) and damage, handing, reload respectively (20% buff, 30 stat points. This means you can get up to 80 stat points to handling and reload and 50 to stability.
Overflow and MKC have very poor synergy with each other, with MKC unable to be procced while overflow is active. While these are both excellent perks, the combo is not worth keeping tags:god-pve

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=839105230,106909392,3038247973,4104185692

dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=4090651448,1087426260,3038247973,4104185692

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:god-pve

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP God Roll Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=3038247973,1015611457

// Fatebringer (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:god-pve

// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve

// Fatebringer (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Any (Handling Preferred) + Appended/Tac + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly
PvP: Hammer/Smallbore/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot
Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP God Roll Extended/Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip tags:pve,pvp
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3038247973,1015611457

 tags:pvp

// Frozen Orbit (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Fluted/Arrowhead Brake + Accurized + Firmly Planted/Moving Target/Killing Wind/No Distractions + Snapshot/Quickdraw/Opening Shot/KC/MKC
This sniper has some interesting rolls. With KC and MKC it can get ohk body shots, and Vorpal makes it one of the ways to counter a behemoth super. However, these all roll in the same slot as the handling perks, so you are giving up better ads and feel for these build perks tags:god-pvp

The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range. tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3717177717&perks=663495154,1087426260,4071163871,4049631843

// Hawkmoon (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged + Alloy Mag + Rangefinder/Killing Wind/Opening Shot/Eye of the Storm + Polymer Grip/ Combat Grip
Opening Shot is arguably the best in slot perk. Rangefinder is generally the go to (it does add ~3M of base range) but Hawkmoon is a run and gun weapon (in my opinion) - if you want range, run a 120 or Luna Faction boots =) Opening Shot gives serious bonus to accuracy on ground and in air and helps guarantee landing the first crit (or 7 stack OHKO if you wait for perk to reset). Moving Target is nearly worthless due to high base AA stat. tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3856705927&perks=3250034553,1431678320,2846385770,3438534621

//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:god-pvp

// Loud Lullaby (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Polygonal/Corkscrew/Smallbore + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Slideshot/Tunnel Vision/Heating Up/Moving Target + Kill Clip / Wellspring/ Eye of the Storm/EP
This gun can get some really nice rolls. Kill Clip allows it to two tap after the damage nerf, and Tunnel Vision combos really well with it since they both proc off a kill. Depending on how the gun feels for you, the split minor stat boost barrels and steady rounds can help to make up for the terrible base stats tags:pvp
